name: Monster Limo CARnage
description:
Monster Limo CARnage game has beautiful locations and tracks that will test your driving skills while Crushing the Cars.All you need to do in this action game is to crush all the cars.crushing each car will give you more time to crush.
Happy Endless Crushing!

Game Features:
• Beautiful realistic Monster Limo to drive - feel the handling and suspension!
• Real physics and handling - can you handle the power?!
• Amazing 3D world, full of details to explore
• Adjusted cameras give the perfect view.
